src:
Druckerova Dobrá voľba odmietla predvolebnú spoluprácu s bugárovcami
03 Nov 2019, 18:35 by Webnoviny
3.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Dobrá voľba odmietla predvolebnú spoluprácu s koaličnou stranou Most-Híd. Informoval o tom Denník N. Strana tým reagovala na nedeľňajšie vyjadrenie podpredsedu Mosta-Híd Ábela Ravasza, ktorý v diskusnej relácii televízie Markíza Na telo s Michalom Kovačičom povedal, že s Dobrou voľbou rokujú o predvolebnej spolupráci a spoločnej kandidátke.
Dobrá voľba potvrdila, že Most-Híd prejavil záujem o rokovania s nimi. „Aktuálne predvolebnú spoluprácu so stranou Most-Híd nezvažujeme,“ priblížila strana. Tomáš Drucker v nedeľu odmietol aj to, že by oslovil ministerku Andreu Kalavskú, aby za jeho stranu kandidovala.
Viac k témam: Parlamentné voľby do NRSR na Slovensku 2020Zdroj: Webnoviny.sk – Druckerova Dobrá voľba odmietla predvolebnú spoluprácu s bugárovcami © SITA Všetky práva vyhradené.
text:
Drucker's Good Choice refused pre-election cooperation with buggers
03 Nov 2019, 18:35 by Webnoviny
3.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - A good choice has refused pre-election cooperation with the coalition party Most-Híd. The party responded to Sunday's statement by Deputy Chairman Most-Híd Abel Ravasz, who in a talk show on TV Markiza On the body with Michal Kovacic said that they are negotiating with Good Choice about election cooperation and a common candidate.
A good choice confirmed that Most-Híd showed interest in negotiating with them. "We are not considering current pre-election cooperation with Most-Híd," the party said. Tomas Drucker also rejected on Sunday that he would ask Minister Andrea Kalavska to run for his party.
More on Topics: Parliamentary Elections to the NRSR in Slovakia 2020Source: Webnoviny.sk - Drucker's Good Choice Rejected Pre-Election Co-operation with Buggers © SITA All rights reserved.
